TASK.NAME: cn.com.servyou.platform.sb.dao.impl.NsrzgxxDaoImpl.getNsrzgxx
TASK.DESCRIPTION: 查询中间库纳税人资格信息

SQL.NAME: getNsrzgxx
SQL.CLAUSE: select DJXH, LCSLID, LRRQ, LRR_DM, NSRZGLX_DM, QXBZ, RDPZUUID, SJGSDQ, SJGSRQ, SJZZRQ, XGRQ, XGR_DM, to_char(YXQQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') YXQQ, to_char(YXQZ,'yyyy-mm-dd') YXQZ from RD_NSRZGXX_JGB where DJXH = ? and YXQQ<=to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-DD') and YXQZ>=to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-DD')

SQL.NAME: insertSfzrdxx
SQL.CLAUSE: insert into RD_NSRZGXX_JGB (DJXH, LCSLID, LRRQ, LRR_DM, NSRZGLX_DM, QXBZ, RDPZUUID, SJGSDQ, SJGSRQ, SJZZRQ, XGRQ, XGR_DM, YXQQ, YXQZ) values (?, ?, to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), ?, to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
